.. _singularity_sif_info:

singularity sif info
--------------------

Display data object info

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~


Display info about a data object from a SIF image.

::

  singularity sif info <id> <sif_path>

Examples
~~~~~~~~

::

  sif info 1 image.sif

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for info

SEE ALSO
~~~~~~~~

* :ref:`singularity sif <singularity_sif>` 	 - Manipulate Singularity Image Format (SIF) images
